name: Guild of European Business Travel Association
goal: GEBTA, the Guild of European Business Travel Agents, represents the travel management industry with some 300 major travel management companies generating a significant part of the business travel sales in Europe.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Package travel directive
Competition issues
Visa
VAT
Passenger regulations
insurance mediation
Tourism issues
